name: Nibbles PBC
description: Provider of pet insurance services intended to get stress-free pet healthcare. The company's services offer dog and cat insurance coverage that includes vet visits and tests, emergency care, routine treatment and chronic problems, enabling pets to get a long and healthy life.
one_liner: Provider of pet insurance services intended to get stress-free pet healthcare. The company's services offer dog and cat insurance coverage that includes vet visits and tests, emergency care, routine treatment and chronic problems, enabling pets to get a long and healthy life.
